charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to Distribute  and Possession with Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to the custody of Bureau of Prisons for a period of 262 months on Count 1 with 8 years of supervised release to follow with standard conditions. Fine waived. Special Assesment $100. Upon motion of United States, counts 2 &; 3 are Dismissed. Defendant's motion to withdraw his guilty plea is denied. Defendant remanded

21:841(a)(1)(b)(1)(C) &; 18: 2 Possession with Intent to Distribute of a Controlled Substance(4)
21:841(a)(1)(b)(1)(C) Possession with Intent to Distribute a Controlled Substance(4ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to a period of 24 months on count(s) 4,6,8 of the superseding indictment with 3 years of supervised release to follow with special conditions. Fine waived. Total Special Assessment $300.00. Upon motion of U.S. Attorney, count 1 of the indictment is hereby Dismissed. Defendant shall participate in an outpatient program approved for the treatment of alcohol and/or drug dependency with testing and submit to warrantless search. Recommendation: Intensive Drug Treatment, Morgantown or Elkton and defendant granted time served in federal custody. Cooperation in collection of DNA

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to a period of 46 months on Count 7 of the Indictment and shall run consecutive to state sentence. 3 years of supervised release with special conditions. Fine waived. Drug program with testing. Recommendation: Intensive Drug Treatment. Defendant to Cooperate in collection DNA, submit to warrantless search and granted credit for time served in relation to this matter. Defendant remanded. Upon motion of United States Attorney, Count 1 of the indictment is Dismissed. Special Assessment $100.00.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 84 months on count 7 of the second superseding indictment with 3 years of supervised release to follow with special conditions. Fine Waived. Special Assessment $100.00. Upon motion of U.S. Attorney, count 1 of the indictment is hereby dismissed. Defendant to participate in outpatient program for treatment of alcohol and/or drug dependency with testing and submit to warrantless search. Recommendation: Intensive Drug Treatment Program &; Elkton. Defendant granted credit for time served in federal custody
